name: Senior Backend Engineer - Ahmed El-Sayed
text:
Ahmed El-Sayed
Senior Software Engineer
Location: Cairo, Egypt
Phone: +20 100 555 1234
Email: ahmed.sayed@example.com
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/ahmed-sayed
GitHub: github.com/ahmed-dev

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience designing scalable backend systems, distributed architectures, and high-performance microservices. Specialized in Python, Go, container orchestration, and system optimization. Proven ability to lead engineering teams and deliver mission-critical, highly available platforms.

CORE COMPETENCIES
- Backend Architecture, Microservices, Distributed Systems
- Python, Go, Node.js
- REST, gRPC, GraphQL
- Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, CI/CD
- PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
- High-Throughput APIs, Load Balancing, Observability
- Team Leadership, Code Reviews, System Design

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Senior Backend Engineer — Microsoft (Remote)
2021 – Present
- Designed and deployed microservices handling 20M+ daily requests with <100ms latency
- Led migration from monolithic system to Kubernetes-based architecture, reducing deployment time by 60%
- Implemented distributed caching with Redis Cluster improving throughput by 45%
- Mentored 6 junior engineers and drove team-wide coding standards

Backend Software Engineer — Vodafone
2018 – 2021
- Developed scalable billing services with Python + FastAPI serving 6M+ customers
- Built automated DevOps pipelines using GitHub Actions and Terraform
- Reduced cloud spending by 20% through service optimization and resource audits

Software Engineer — ITS Egypt
2016 – 2018
- Developed internal REST APIs and improved authentication pipeline
- Integrated microservices with internal reporting systems

EDUCATION
B.Sc. in Computer Science – Ain Shams University

CERTIFICATIONS
- AWS Solutions Architect Associate
- Docker & Kubernetes Certified Developer

PROJECTS
- High-Performance Payment Gateway — 50k TPS, built with Go + Kafka
- Observability Platform — Prometheus + Grafana dashboards for distributed services

name: Senior Data Scientist - Sara Khaled
text:

- Automated reporting dashboards saving 200+ engineering hours monthly
